 10#ifndef VSIP_OPT_GET_LOCAL_VIEW_HPP
 11#define VSIP_OPT_GET_LOCAL_VIEW_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/domain_utils.hpp>
 20
 21
 22
 23/***********************************************************************
 24  Declarations
 25***********************************************************************/
 26
 27namespace vsip
 28{
 29namespace impl
 30{
 31
 32/// Get a local view of a subblock.
 33
 34template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 35	  typename                            T,
 36	  typename                            Block,
 37	  typename                            MapT = typename Block::map_type>
 38struct Get_local_view_class
 39{
 40  static
 41  View<T, typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type>
 42  exec(
 43    View<T, Block> v)
 44  {
 45    typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type block_t;
 46    typedef typename View_block_storage<block_t>::type::equiv_type storage_t;
 47
 48    storage_t blk = get_local_block(v.block());
 49    return View<T, block_t>(blk);
 50  }
 51};
 52
 53template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 54	  typename                            T,
 55	  typename                            Block>
 56struct Get_local_view_class<View, T, Block, Local_map>
 57{
 58  static
 59  View<T, typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type>
 60  exec(
 61    View<T, Block> v)
 62  {
 63    typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type block_t;
 64    assert((Type_equal<Block, block_t>::value));
 65    return v;
 66  }
 67};
 68	  
 69
 70
 71template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 72	  typename                            T,
 73	  typename                            Block>
 74View<T, typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type>
 75get_local_view(
 76  View<T, Block> v)
 77{
 78  return Get_local_view_class<View, T, Block>::exec(v);
 79}
 80
 81
 82
 83template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 84	  typename                            T,
 85	  typename                            Block>
 86void
 87view_assert_local(
 88  View<T, Block> v,
 89  index_type     sb)
 90{
 91  assert_local(v.block(), sb);
 92}
 93
 94
 95

100#endif // VSIP_IMPL_GET_LOCAL_VIEW_HPP
